title: How to Make Non Slip Concrete Steps

steps.headline: Paint the steps with clear paving paint.
Sprinkle fine sand over the wet paint.
Allow to dry.
steps.description: The results should be reasonable clear steps with some invisible grip!

text: Paint the steps with clear paving paint.  Sprinkle fine sand over the wet paint.  Brush away any excess sand.  Allow to dry. The results should be reasonable clear steps with some invisible grip!
